acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] ReplicatedFsync e2e passes with k-of-n healthy.
- [ ] Failure-mode receipt reflects insufficient eligible replicas.
- [ ] min_seen/read-gating validated.
- [ ] Tests write only under ./tmp.
description:
**Problem**
We have no end-to-end coverage for ReplicatedFsync durability receipts or read-gating semantics under partial failure.
design:
**Design**
- Add an integration test that performs mutations with DurabilityClass::REPLICATED_FSYNC(k) and validates receipts (requested/achieved/min_seen) via IPC.
- Add a failure-mode test with one peer down to ensure receipts report pending/unavailable correctly.
- Assert min_seen/read-gating behavior across nodes.
title: ReplicatedFsync durability e2e
